awd_titl_txt: Travel to Attend:  Engineering Foundation Conference on     "Fluid Particle Interaction" to be held in Davos,           Switzerland, May 3-8, 1987
awd_abstract_narration: Support is requested for 9 American engineers to attend an                      Engineering Foundation Conference on "Fluid-Particle                            Interactions" on May 3-8, 1987 at Davos, Switzerland.  This                     conference is organized with the intent of bringing together a                  variety of researchers from the U.S. and Europe to exchange                     knowledge and information in this field.  The interchange would                 be about equal in each direction.  Europe-U.S., and the principal               investigator will prepare a summary for program use at the                      National Science Foundation.  A grant is highly recommended.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
